result.markdown:
---
title: "Bison"
---

I completed my master's thesis in biology at the University of Nebraska-Kearney with [Dr. Dustin Ranglack](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=T9fOQmoAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao) studying bison spatial ecology. My research examined space-use and habitat selection patterns across five different herds with varying management regimes including free-range and fenced pastures. My first chapter on space-use patterns is currently being prepared for *Journal of Wildlife Management* and my second chapter on habitat selection is being prepared for *Conservation Biology*.

## {{< fa binoculars >}} Space Use Patterns
In this portion of my research, I assessed bison home ranges using autocorrelated kernel density estimates as well as foraging patch size using first-passage time analysis. These were calculated at an annual scale as well as the seasonally (growing and non-growing). These were fitted into generalized linear models to assess how space use differed between herds and across seasons

### {{< fa satellite-dish >}} Home Range: Autocorrelated Kernel Density Estimates
Example code from home range analysis


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#AKDE for loop
akde.summary<-data.frame(matrix(nrow= length(unique(bison.move$individual.local.identifier)), ncol = 5))
colnames(akde.summary)<- c("ID","Bandwidth","CI.Low","CI.ML","CI.High")

for (i in 1:length(unique(bison.move$individual.local.identifier))){
  b1<-subset(bison.move,bison.move$individual.local.identifier==i)
  bison.move2<-move(x=b1$location.long,y=b1$location.lat,time=b1$timestamp,data=b1,proj=CRS("+proj=aea"),animal=b1$individual.local.identifier)
  bison.telemetry<-as.telemetry(bison.move2,timeformat="",timezone="",projection="+proj=aea",UERE=NULL,drop=TRUE)
  bison.guess<-ctmm.guess(bison.telemetry,interactive = FALSE)
  bison.fit<-ctmm.fit(bison.telemetry,bison.guess)
  bison.select<-ctmm.select(bison.telemetry,bison.fit)
  bison.akde<-akde(bison.telemetry,bison.select,debias=TRUE,smooth=TRUE,error=0.001,res = 10,grid = NULL)
  bison.hr<-homerange(bison.telemetry,bison.fit,method = "AKDE")
  
  writeShapefile(object=bison.hr,folder="F:/Bison_Thesis/Analysis_thesis/Home Range/AKDE_Shapefiles",
                 file=paste0(unique(b1$tag)[1]), level.UD=0.95,level=0.95,overwrite_layer = T)
  
  hr.summary<-as.data.frame(summary(bison.hr)) #convert home range summary to data frame

  akde.summary[i, 1]<- as.numeric(print(b1$individual.local.identifier[1])) #ID
  akde.summary[i, 2]<- print(hr.summary[2,1])                               #bandwidth
  akde.summary[i, 3]<- print(hr.summary[2,2])                               #low
  akde.summary[i, 4]<- print(hr.summary[2,3])                               #ML
  akde.summary[i, 5]<- print(hr.summary[2,4])                               #high
}
rm(b1,bison.move2,bison.telemetry,bison.hr,bison.fit,bison.guess,hr.summary,i, bison.select, bison.akde)

tag<-unique(bison.move$tag.local.identifier)
ID<-unique(bison.move$individual.local.identifier)
foo<-as.data.frame(cbind(ID,tag))
akde.summary<-merge(foo,akde.summary, by="ID")
rm(foo, ID, tag)

akde.summary<-akde.summary[order(akde.summary$tag),]
View(akde.summary)

#Export
write.csv(akde.summary,file = "Bison_HomeRange_Summary.csv")
```
:::
